tuv.seg: 你的朋友 ?EMAIL?，邀请你加入星星火社区
Invitation to Wildfire from ?EMAIL?

你的朋友 ?USERNAME?，邀请你加入星星火社区！
你的朋友 ?USERNAME? 给你留言:
"?MESSAGE?"
成为星星火社区的一员，你将会被邀请参加其他各种非常棒的口碑活动。在这些活动中你可以：
- 根据你的兴趣可以得到最新的产品和服务 - 你可以任意的使用我们提供的产品 - 与朋友谈论你的体验 - 让我们了解你们的需要
星星火为你提供最自然的、真实的口碑！同时我们将保护你的个人隐私，不会公开你的个人信息。
请打开如下地址进行注册： http://community.wildfire.asia/public/register/register/a/?AUTHCODE?
期待你加入我们！
星星火——中国口碑社区
----------------------------------------------
如果有任何问题请联系我们： 400-600-8707 home@wildfire.asia

?USERNAME? has invited you to join the Wildfire word-of-mouth community.
?USERNAME? has the following message for you:
"?MESSAGE?"
As a Wildfire Member, you'll also be invited to other natural word-of-mouth campaigns where you can:
- Receive free products and services, selected for your interests - Use them as you normally would - Talk about them as you normally would - Let us know what your friends have to say
Wildfire is all about natural, authentic word-of-mouth - no pyramid schemes or spamming. And don't worry, we respect you privacy and won't share your personal information or spam you.
Just click the following link to join: http://community.wildfire.asia/public/register/register/a/?AUTHCODE?
We hope to see you soon!
- Your friends at Wildfire.
---------------------------------------------- Contact us if you have any questions: 400-600-8707 home@wildfire.asia
重置星星火账号密码
Reset Your Wildfire Password

请你在24小时内点击下面的链接，修改你的星星火账号密码:
?RESETPASSWORDLINK?
如果你错误的接收到该邮件，请忽略它或与我们联系。
谢谢!
---------------------------------------------- 如果你有任何问题请联系： 电话：400-600-8707 邮箱：home@wildfire.asia QQ：852666147

To reset the password for your Wildfire account, please click the following link and enter your new password within 24 hours:
?RESETPASSWORDLINK?
Believe you received this e-mail in error? Please ignore it, or contact us.
Thank you!
星星火 Wildfire http://community.wildfire.asia ---------------------------------------------- Contact us if you have any questions: 400-600-8707 home@wildfire.asia
激活你的星星火账户
Active your wildfire accounts

请你在24小时内点击下面的链接，激活你的账户:
?ENABLEACCOUNTLINK?
如果你错误的接收到该邮件，请忽略它或与我们联系。
谢谢!
---------------------------------------------- 如果你有任何问题请联系： 电话：400-600-8707 邮箱：home@wildfire.asia

Please click the link shows below to active your account: ?ENABLEACCOUNTLINK? If this is a wrong email, please ignore it or contact with us.
Thank you!
星星火 Wildfire http://community.wildfire.asia ---------------------------------------------- Contact us if you have any questions: 400-600-8707 home@wildfire.asia
